name: Light 'Em Up (GGJ20)
description:
Two-player games where you have to repair the damage made by a ghost in your house. If the damages are too high you will lose You have to go as furth as you can in an endless level structure.

Use a controller!

This game was made during the Global Game Jam 2020 by ConfusedGames

--- Programming: Michelangelo Borsarelli

--- Pixel Art: Benedetta Abbate, Emma Nosengo, Luca Pavesi

--- Sound Design: Leonardo Assom

--- Design: Antonio Vazzana
